column2: The market for the produce will be ensured by providing subsidies for high yielding seeds, irrigation etc., to promote the production of agricultural crops including slender-grained and aromatic rice, sugarcane, maize, milk, fish, meat, coffee, tea, ginger, turmeric, akabare chilli, onion and potatoes.

column2: I have allocated Rs. 2 billion 980 million for the Prime Minister's Agriculture Modernization Project.

column2: A state-of-the-art laboratory will be established to produce plants using tissue culture technology.

column2: I have allocated Rs. 1 billion 440 million for the development of the fruit sector.

column1: कृषिको व्यवसायीकरणका लागि राजमार्ग केन्द्रित तीन सय उत्पादन संस्थालाई शुभारम्भ पूँजी उपलब्ध गराउने र उत्पादित वस्तुको बजार सुनिश्चित हुने व्यवस्था मिलाएको छु।

column1: यसका लागि रु. १ अर्ब १२ करोड विनियोजन गरेको छु।

column1: कृषकलाई समयमै मलखाद आपूर्ति सुनिश्चित गर्न अनुदानका लागि रु. २७ अर्ब ९५ करोड विनियोजन गरेको छु।
column2: I have allocated Rs. 27 billion 950 million for subsidy to ensure timely supply of fertilizer to farmers.

column1: जैविक एवं प्रांगारिक मलको उत्पादन तथा उपयोगलाई प्रवर्द्धन गरिनेछ।
column2: Production and use of organic and bio-fertilizers will be promoted.

column1: रासायनिक विषादीको उपयोगलाई निरुत्साहित गरी जैविक विषादीको प्रवर्द्धन गरिनेछ।
column2: Use of chemical pesticides will be discouraged, and bio-pesticides will be promoted.

column2: An auction centre for agricultural crops, livestock and fruits will be established in major commercial cities in collaboration with the public and private sectors.

column1: कृषि बजार क्षेत्रमा निश्चित प्रतिशत स्थान किसानका लागि होल्डिङ यार्ड सञ्चालन गर्न उपलब्ध गराइनेछ।
column2: A certain percentage of space in the agricultural market area will be made available for farmers to operate Holding Yards.

column1: अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय र प्रमुख आन्तरिक विमानस्थलमा शीत भण्डार स्थापना गरिनेछ।
column2: Cold storage will be established at international and major domestic airports to promote export of agricultural produce.

column2: Facilitation will be made in certification and laboratory testing fees for exports of agricultural produce.

column2: Arrangement will be made to ease access to credit based on collateral of agricultural produce.

column2: I have made arrangements to subsidize the interest on loans for agriculture and fruit enterprises, which typically takes a long time to yield returns, on pre-production phase.

column1: गाई-भैंसी पालन प्रवर्द्धन केन्द्रको विकास गरिनेछ।

column2: Fifty million doses of vaccine will be produced next year to control epidemic diseases in livestock.

column2: A free vaccination campaign will be conducted to eradicate PPR and classical swine fever within the next three years.

column2: An intensive vaccination program will be conducted to control Foot and Mouth Disease.

column1: खोप उत्पादन तथा सेवा सञ्चालनका लागि रु. ४० करोड व्यवस्था गरेको छु।
column2: I have allocated Rs. 400 million for vaccine production and vaccination service.

column2: I have allocated Rs. 1 billion 650 million to provide a subsidy on crop and livestock insurance premiums for small farmers.

column1: कृषि अनुसन्धानमा संलग्न कृषि अनुसन्धान परिषद् लगायतका निकायको क्षमता अभिवृद्धि गरिनेछ।
column2: The capacity of agencies involved in agricultural research, including the Nepal Agricultural Research Council, will be enhanced.

column2: Additional 75 agricultural technologies will be developed in the next fiscal year.

column1: कृषि अनुसन्धान तथा विकास तर्फ रु. ३ अर्ब ५२ करोड विनियोजन गरेको छु।

column2: The capacity of the national grid will be increased to 4500 MW by adding 900 MW of electricity in the coming fiscal year.

column2: Legal arrangements will be made to involve the private sector in the construction and distribution of electricity transmission lines.

column2: The construction of 1200 MW Budhigandaki, 670 MW Dudhkoshi, 417 MW Nalsingad Reservoir Hydropower Project and 280 MW Naumure Multipurpose Hydropower Project will be initiated to meet the demand during the dry season.

column2: The construction of the Sunkoshi-Third hydropower project will be carried forward after a detailed feasibility study.

column2: Detailed engineering design of Karnali-Chisapani hydropower project of 10800 MW will be initiated.

column2: Fossil fuel will be gradually replaced by clean and renewable energy to achieve the goal of net zero carbon emissions by 2045.

column2: Arrangements will be made to establish 100 megawatts of solar power from the private sector to diversify energy production.

column1: हरित हाइड्रोजन प्रवर्द्धन गर्न अनुसन्धान र विकासका लागि आवश्यक बजेट व्यवस्था गरेको छु।
column2: I have arranged the necessary budget for the research and development to promote green hydrogen.

column2: The construction of the Hetauda-Dhalkebar-Inaruwa, and Khimti-Bahrabise-Lapsifedi 400 KV transmission line will be completed.

column1: कर्णाली कोरिडोर ४ सय के.भी. प्रसारण लाइनको निर्माण कार्यलाई तीव्रता दिइनेछ।
column2: The construction of the Karnali Corridor 400 kV transmission line will be expedited.

column1: आर्थिक वृद्धिका सम्भावनाका क्षेत्रलाई समेटेर एकीकृत विकासको अवधारणाअनुरूप नमूना विकास अभियान सञ्चालन गर्न भरतपुर-बुटवल-पोखरा-(मध्यवर्ती) भरतपुरलाई तीनवटा कोणमा राखी गण्डकी आर्थिक उपत्यका परियोजना प्रस्ताव गरेको छु।
column2: Aligning the concept of integrated development to cover the potential areas of economic growth, the Gandaki Economic Triangle Project is proposed to carry out a model development campaign connecting three corners - Bharatpur-Butwal-Pokhara- (Mugling) Bharatpur.

column1: यस परियोजना अन्तर्गत निजी क्षेत्रको साझेदारीमा औद्योगिक इकोसिस्टम निर्माण गरी औद्योगिक पुनर्स्थान र गुणस्तरीय रोजगारी सृजना गरिनेछ।
column2: Under this project, industrial revival and quality employment will be created by developing the industrial ecosystem in partnership with the private sector.

column1: गण्डकी उपत्यकामा पनि निर्माणाधीन नारायणघाट-बुटवल र मध्यवर्ती-पोखरा सडक खण्डको विस्तार कार्य आगामी आर्थिक वर्षमा सम्पन्न गरिनेछ।
column2: The under-construction Narayanghat-Butwal and Mugling-Pokhara road sections in the Gandaki Triangle will be completed in the next fiscal year.

column1: बुटवल-पोखरा सडक खण्डलाई डेडिकेटेड दुई लेनमा स्तरोन्नति गरिनेछ।
column2: The Butwal-Pokhara road section will be upgraded to a dedicated two-lane.

column1: उपत्यकाका तीनवटै कोरिडोरमा औद्योगिक विकासका लागि आवश्यक यातायात संरचना निर्माण गरिनेछ।
column2: Necessary transport network will be developed for industrial development in all three corridors of the triangle.

column1: उपत्यका परियोजना अन्तर्गत नारायणघाट-बुटवल खण्डलाई निर्माण सामग्री तथा हेवी उद्योगको केन्द्र, मध्यवर्ती-पोखरा खण्डलाई कृषि तथा खाद्य प्रशोधन उद्योगको केन्द्र र पोखरा-बुटवल खण्डलाई विद्युतीय उपकरण, जुत्ता, लुगा, कालीन, लगायत घरायसी उपयोगका वस्तु तथा सेवा सम्बन्धी उद्योगको केन्द्रको रूपमा विकास गरिनेछ।
column2: Under this Triangle Project, the Narayanghat-Butwal section will be developed as a construction materials and heavy industry hub, the Mugling-Pokhara section as an agriculture and food processing industrial hub, and the Pokhara-Butwal section as a household goods, including electrical appliances, shoes, garments, carpets and service-related industrial hub.

column1: परियोजना कार्यान्वयनका लागि भरतपुर कोणमा पर्यटकीय सेवा, जलयात्रा र विशेषीकृत स्वास्थ्य सेवा, पोखरा कोणमा साहसिक मनोरञ्जन, पर्यटकीय सेवा तथा अनुसन्धानमूलक उच्च शिक्षा र बुटवल-भैरहवा कोणमा धार्मिक पर्यटन, डाटा सेन्टर तथा सूचना प्रविधि सम्बन्धी संस्था विकासका लागि निजी क्षेत्रको सहकार्यमा आवश्यक पूर्वाधार निर्माण गरिनेछ।
column2: In collaboration with the private sector, the necessary infrastructure facilities will be developed for eco-tourism services, water rafting, and specialized health services in the Bharatpur node, adventure recreation, eco-tourism services and research-based higher education in the Pokhara node, and religious tourism, data centre and information technology-based institutional development in the Butwal-Bhairahawa node through the implementation of this project.

column1: यस परियोजनालाई सार्वजनिक-निजी साझेदारीको नमूना परियोजनाको रूपमा विकास गरी कार्यान्वयन गर्न रु. २ अर्ब विनियोजन गरेको छु।
column2: I have allocated Rs. 2 billion to this project to develop and implement it as a model project of public-private partnership.

column1: निजगढदेखि ढल्केबरसम्मको पूर्व-पश्चिम राजमार्ग आसपासको क्षेत्रलाई नेपाली कालीन कोरिडोरको रूपमा विकास गरिनेछ।
column2: The area around the East-West Highway from Nijgadh to Dhalkebar will be developed as the Nepali Carpet Corridor.

column1: सार्वजनिक निकायले नेपालमा बनेको कालीन खरीद गर्नुपर्ने व्यवस्था गरिनेछ।
column2: Arrangements will be made for the public entities to purchase carpets made in Nepal.

column1: प्रदेश तथा स्थानीय तहको सहकार्यमा सुनसरी-धनकुटाको शारदा नदी आसपासको क्षेत्रलाई कृषि कोरिडोर, जुम्लाको तिला नदी र हिमा नदी आसपासको क्षेत्रलाई मास कोरिडोर, बाराको कोल्हबीदेखि सिमरौनगढ सडक आसपास क्षेत्रलाई माछा कोरिडोरको रूपमा विकास गरिनेछ।
column2: In collaboration with the province and local level, the area around the Sharada River in Salyan-Rukum will be developed as an agricultural corridor, the area around the Hima River and Tila River in Jumla will be developed as a Marsi rice corridor, the area around the Kolbi to Simraungadh road in Bara will be developed as a fishery corridor.

column1: कञ्चनपुरको दैजी, बाँकेको नौवस्ता र रुपन्देहीको मोतिपुर औद्योगिक क्षेत्रको निर्माण कार्य सुरु गरिनेछ।
column2: Construction work will be started for the development of the industrial estates of Daiji in Kanchanpur, Nauvasta in Banke, and Motipur in Rupandehi.

column1: औद्योगिक क्षेत्र र विशेष आर्थिक क्षेत्र सञ्चालन र व्यवस्थापनमा निजी क्षेत्रसँग साझेदारी गरिनेछ।
column2: Partnership with the private sector will be done for the operation and management of industrial zones and special economic zones.

column1: मकवानपुरको मयुरधाप र चितवनको शारदानगर लगायतका औद्योगिक क्षेत्र सार्वजनिक-निजी साझेदारीमा निर्माण तथा सञ्चालन गरिनेछ।
column2: The industrial zones such as Mayur Dhap in Makwanpur and Sharda Nagar in Chitwan will be developed and operated in public-private partnership.

column1: कञ्चनपुरको दैजी, बाँकेको नौवस्ता र रुपन्देहीको मोतिपुर औद्योगिक क्षेत्रको निर्माण कार्य सुरु गरिनेछ।
column2: The construction work of the industrial estates in Daiji of Kanchanpur, Nauvasta of Banke, and Motipur of Rupandehi will start.

column1: औद्योगिक क्षेत्र र विशेष आर्थिक क्षेत्र सञ्चालन र व्यवस्थापनमा निजी क्षेत्रसँग साझेदारी गरिनेछ।
column2: Partnership with the private sector will be established for the operation and management of industrial zones and special economic zones.

column1: मकवानपुरको मयुरधाप र चितवनको शारदानगर लगायतका औद्योगिक क्षेत्र सार्वजनिक-निजी साझेदारीमा निर्माण तथा सञ्चालन गरिनेछ।
column2: The industrial zones such as Mayur Dhap in Makwanpur and Sharda Nagar in Chitwan will be developed and operated in public-private partnership.

column1: उद्यममा युवा सहभागिता बढाउन स्टार्टअप र नवप्रवर्तनका लागि इकोसिस्टम विकास गरी उद्यमशील वातावरण सृजना गरिनेछ।
column2: To increase youth participation in entrepreneurship, an ecosystem for start-ups and innovation will be developed to create an entrepreneurial environment.

column1: स्टार्टअप उद्यमीलाई सहजीकरण र नियमन गर्न स्टार्टअप बोर्ड गठन गरिनेछ।
column2: A Start-up Board will be set up to facilitate and regulate start-up entrepreneurs.

column1: स्टार्टअप उद्यमीको वित्तीय आवश्यकता सम्बोधन गर्न रु. १ अर्ब को नेपाल स्टार्टअप कोष खडा गरेको छु।
column2: I have set up a Rs. 1 billion Nepal Start-up Fund to address the financial needs of start-up entrepreneurs.

column1: युवाको उद्यमशील सोचलाई व्यवसायमा परिणत गर्न प्रत्येक प्रदेशमा "बिजनेस इनक्यूबेसन सेन्टर" सञ्चालन गरिनेछ।
column2: Business Incubation Centres will be operated in each province to transform the entrepreneurial thinking of the youth into business.

column1: बैंक तथा वित्तीय संस्थाबाट प्रवाह हुने कर्जालाई नवप्रवर्तनमा प्रवाह गर्न प्रोत्साहन गरिनेछ।
column2: Credit lending from banks and financial institutions will be encouraged and promoted to invest in innovation.

column1: विभिन्न सम्झौतासँग कोषको रकम "प्राइवेट इक्विटी फण्ड" र "भेन्चर क्यापिटल फण्ड"का उद्देश्यभित्र एकाइमा लगानी गर्ने व्यवस्था मिलाइनेछ।
column2: Arrangement will be made to invest in the securities unit of the Private Equity Fund and Venture Capital Fund from various contractual funds.

column1: महिला उद्यमीद्वारा उत्पादित वस्तु तथा सेवाको प्रवर्द्धनका लागि सार्वजनिक-निजी साझेदारीमा काठमाडौंको चोभारमा अन्तर्राष्ट्रियस्तरको प्रदर्शनीस्थल निर्माण गरिनेछ।
column2: An international-level exhibition centre will be developed at Chobhar, Kathmandu in a public-private partnership model to promote goods and services produced by women entrepreneurs.

column1: महिला उद्यमीद्वारा उत्पादित वस्तुको ब्राण्डिङ गर्न शेड पोर्टलमा प्रवर्द्धन गर्ने व्यवस्था मिलाइनेछ।
column2: Arrangements will be made for the entry of goods and services produced by women entrepreneurs on the trade portal for branding.

column1: महिला उद्यमीद्वारा उत्पादित वस्तु बिक्री गर्न "कोसेली घर"को स्थापना र सञ्चालन गरिनेछ।
column2: Koseli House will be established and developed to sell goods produced by women entrepreneurs.

column1: बजारको मागअनुसार उत्पादक क्षेत्रको संलग्नतामा कार्यस्थलमा आधारित अप्रेन्टिसशिप कार्यक्रम सञ्चालन गरी सीप र रोजगारलाई सम्बद्ध गरिनेछ।
column2: Apprenticeship programs based on the workplace will be conducted in collaboration with the production sector as per market demand to link skills and employment.
